attributes.action: Prevent ITV from showing England Matches and the FA Cup
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ian Wright may be bad, but surely even he is better than Andy Townsend and Robbie Earle? Plus England never win on ITV, their coverage is wall to wall adverts with no analysis and people will stop watching Englands most important football matches.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
